page.title: 06POPULATION WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {POPULATION WOODHALL SPA There have been several changes in the population of W.Spa where borings which were originally for coal began in 1811 at Woodhall.The Spa came later when a small bath house was built.In those years it was said that the floating population of visitors exceeded the number of permanent residents.In 1901 the amount of people (excluding visitors) had grown to 988, by 1911 1,484 and in 1921 1,635, in 1961 the figure was 2,261,by 1971 down to 1970 with 170 more women than men, and in 1979 2,445.Facilities for rheumatism sufferers brought visitors and jobs.By the mid 60s the fashion for Spa treatment had ebbed.There is a growing population of nursing home inmates giving W.Spa one of the highest ratios of geriatrics.The population of Woodhall is Caucasian.
